items.content_html: qryn is an indie polyglot, lightweight high-performance observability stack, designed to ingest and analyze logs, metrics and traces from any agent compatible with Loki, Prometheus, OTLP, Tempo, Elastic, InfluxDB, Opentelemetry and more!
